titles.title: A bill to provide for the mandatory revocation of passports of individuals whose child support payments are more than $2,500 in arrears.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/13/2007--Introduced. Amends title IV part D (Child Support and Establishment of Paternity) of the Social Security Act to provide for the mandatory revocation of passports of individuals who are more than $2,500 in arrears in child support payments.
